p: Qualitative screening generally gives an idea about what type of bioactive compounds are present or absent in the tested extracts. The results obtained from the qualitative screening are given in Table 1. From the present study, it was evident that all three flower extracts were found rich in diverse phytochemicals. The extracts were shown to be positive for all chemical types tested where the degree of presence varied. In DrFME, carbohydrates and coumarins were detected in high quantities. In CfFME, carbohydrates and resins were detected in high quantities. And in LsFME, flavonoids, phenols, and tannins were detected in high quantities.
